news_header: Hamas has released three Israeli hostages after 491 days of captivity.
news_text: Hamas freed three Israeli hostages, Ohad Ben Am, Eli Sharab, and Or Levy, in Deit al-Balah. The men appeared thin and weary but walked on their own. They were abducted from Be'er Kibbutz and the Nova Music Festival. The hostages were handed over to the Red Cross and will undergo health checks before reuniting with their families. Israel is set to release 183 Palestinian prisoners in return. Hamas still holds over 70 hostages, with reports indicating that 34 of them are deceased.
